title: Simulation Game-Based Learning for Oral Lesion Diagnosis and Treatment Planning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Oral Anatomy and Oral Pathology
context.additional_context: Job enhancement training for dental equipment manufacturing company employees

learning_goals: Learners can improve diagnostic accuracy to over 85% based on real oral lesion case studies
Learners can cultivate decision-making skills by setting treatment priorities through simulation games with 90% learning satisfaction
Learners can achieve proficiency by repeating treatment planning practice for various lesion types at least three times
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
